summary: TV cowboy taken out of his comfort zone on a working ranch in Montana.
cast: Luke Perry|Emmanuelle Vaugier|Tom Butler|Matt Frewer|Ona Grauer|Chad Willett|Elle-Máijá Tailfeathers|Joshua J. Ballard|Frances Flanagan|David C. Jones|Benjamin Charles Watson|Michael Teigen|Ryan Cunningham|Virgil Davies
title: Bienvenidos al paraíso
